channel.title: Audio with Mangoh red
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I have a question about using Audio examples provided in Legato.
I want to run the audio sample in: "legato_framework/legato/apps/test/audio/audioPlaybackRec". the example compiles correctly, but when I run the command "app runProc audioPlaybackRec --exe = audioPlaybackRecTest - MIC REC /record/remote.wav WAV STOP = 10" I have this error. Someone have tested it these example ? does it require a specific configuration of the WP7702 to support the audio? Thank you. ![image|690x280](upload://aCK8dZniKV28uUIJFzcmjYSOSls.png)

item.title: Audio with Mangoh red
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
Here says WP77 does not support audio:

MangOH Red audio not working WP7702 mangOH Red
I’m trying to run the audioPlaybackRec test on the mangOH Red. I’m running R12 firmware and legato 19.07. Output of CM INFO: Device: WP7702 IMEI: 352653090113606 IMEISV: 4 FSN: VU810385660610 Firmware Version: SWI9X06Y_02.32.02.00 c2e98c jenkins 2019/08/30 07:28:21 Bootloader Version: SWI9X06Y_02.32.02.00 c2e98c jenkins 2019/08/30 07:28:21 MCU Version: …

item.title: Audio with Mangoh red
item.dc:creator: Adeunis
item.description:
Hello everyone, I have a question about using Audio examples provided in Legato.

I want to run the audio sample in: “legato_framework/legato/apps/test/audio/audioPlaybackRec”. the example compiles correctly, but when I run the command “app runProc audioPlaybackRec --exe = audioPlaybackRecTest - MIC REC /record/remote.wav WAV STOP = 10” I have this error. Someone have tested it these example ? does it require a specific configuration of the WP7702 to support the audio? Thank you.

Read full topic
